programme.title: The Florida re-count, 2000
programme.short_synopsis: The various legal issues underlying the failure to elect a new President.
programme.medium_synopsis: The various legal issues underlying the failure to elect either George W Bush or Al Gore as president are explained by Alistair Cooke.
